about_the_game:
A mysterious force suddenly appears in this world, shrouding the entire land like a dark cloud. Even the empire's high priest cannot determine the origin of this power. As the empire's top officials scramble to find solutions, you, as the king's personally appointed envoy, volunteer to investigate this terrifying force.

Under the guidance of the high priest, you arrive at a remote village, the edge of this power's influence. With the king's assistance, you issue a summons here, attracting brave heroes with rich rewards to aid in your investigation.

Train a group of heroes from different parts of the world and even different times and spaces, traverse through silent forests, desolate graveyards, burning lands... to reach that "inaccessible place". Your enemies are not only beasts, bandits, orcs... but also demons, gods, and "those beings".

  • 8 mysterious regions await your footsteps - from the orc tribes to the "inaccessible place", gradually facing even more challenging trials.
  • Over 100 traits - Heroes can gain traits from their adventures. But you must be careful, as some traits come with a heavy price.
  • Over 200 pieces of equipment and accessories - Once belonging to fierce adversaries, it's now your turn to claim them as your own. But as you equip yourself, you must also have enough strength to bear their power.
  • Over 60 adventure events - Unique encounters and events will constantly test your wisdom and courage. Whether to stay out of it or get involved, it's up to you.
  • 38 heroes - Each possessing unique skills, awaiting your assembly, they are your strongest spear and shield.
  • Over 100 monsters - Mad beasts, corrupted insects, reanimated dead... these are just the tip of the iceberg of the enemies you'll face.
  • Upgrade village facilities - Prepare supplies, purchase equipment, train heroes, and get ready for your adventure.

The game features automatic combat, see if Lady Luck is on your side.


Great envoy, strive to reach that "inaccessible place"!

short_description: This game is a turn-based strategy adventure where you play as a king's trusted confidant sent to a remote village to investigate a mysterious power. Search for clues, recruit heroes, confront unknown enemies, and uncover the truth behind the "inaccessible place."
